docs.text: Hypercube Tools ¶ A place for helpful tools. TimeSlip ¶ TimeSlip allows test cases to manipulate time by providing a concrete java.time.Clock implementation that will operate in a deterministic way, independent of the actual passage of time.
docs.title: Hypercube Tools
